dcterms:creator: T. Grear
C. Avery
J. Patterson
D. J. Jacobs
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset of 24 two-dimensional molecules containing challenging spatio-temporal patterns, with each molecule consisting of 29 atoms and 20000 conformations, divided into two classes: functional and nonfunctional.
dcterms:title: Synthetic dataset of 24 two-dimensional molecules
